Activity: Log in, check emails, and review progress on the menu system redesign. Prioritize tasks for the day.
Begin creating visual mockups of the redesigned menu screens. Focus on the visual style, typography, and overall aesthetic.

Share the visual mockups of the menu screens with @CART-1 (Concept Artist) and @TART-1 (Technical Artist) to get their feedback on visual consistency and technical feasibility. @CART-1, @TART-1 Subject: Feedback Request: Menu System Visual Mockups
Explore alternative color palettes for the menu system to ensure accessibility and visual appeal. Consider the game's overall tone and atmosphere.
Incorporate feedback from @CART-1 and @TART-1 into the menu system mockups. Refine the visual design and ensure that the elements are clear, concise, and visually appealing.
Develop interactive prototypes of the menu system to demonstrate how it will function in the game. Use interactive components in Figma or Adobe XD to simulate user interactions and navigation.
Prepare a presentation showcasing the updated menu system and HUD improvements to @LDES-1 and @PROD-1 for final approval. Rehearse the presentation and anticipate questions.
